website_summaries.verdict: Simply freeze the ice mat and insert it into the outer shell to keep your canine companion cool for hours.
pros: Multiple mats can be attached to one another for use by larger dogs
Can also be used as a heating pad in winter
cons: If you forget to freeze, it has no cooling properties

customer_reviews.title: Ice mat for CATS too!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this ice mat! This works much better than another mat we bought him. Just throw it in the freezer & it’ll be good for 2-3 hours. We live in California & it can get pretty hot, as long as this mats out my cat likes to lay on it. Took him a while to not be scared of it but once he realized it kept him cool he loved it! Would be cool if they came out with a different print, like just a color or add cats too. Would also be a good addition to make them in more sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Dogs LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs immediately loved this. All I had to do was place the liquid pack in the freezer and once frozen place inside the strong covering. My dogs LOVE it. I had three shihtzus trying to share it all together. Two could lay their bellies on it vertically. It fits one horizontally. My biggest dog is 20 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: would definitely recommend. just pay more attention when they are puppies
customer_reviews.text: don't know what i would do without these. my pomeranian would have expired by now without her "ice blanky," as she gets overheated in all temperatures with all her hair. these wear very well considering how much they are used. would definitely recommend. just pay more attention when they are puppies, they did destroy the first ice pack I bought with their nails, but i have had 4 more after that (2 dogs) and they are still around.
customer_reviews.author: LEARA C.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Lucy cool in summer
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I freeze it every night, and then every day I put it under my dog’s mat in her doghouse outside. My dog loves it, it allows her to stay outside if it’s 90-95 and normally she would have to be inside if it’s that hot. Since it’s in a doghouse and under a mat, when I check it 8 hours later, it’s actually still a little cool. So I know it keeps her cool during the hottest part of the day. I also keep a frozen rubber water bottle in the back of the doghouse.
customer_reviews.author: Emeraldeyes

customer_reviews.title: At first he only wanted it as a chew toy, but now he'll lay on it!
customer_reviews.text: At first Otis didn't like to lay on it, he preferred to chew it. But now, after a few months he finally decided that he'd rather be cool and comfortable than hot and panting! Victory moment!
customer_reviews.author: TAB

customer_reviews.title: Good but lumpy till it softens up and is more comfortable for dog to use
customer_reviews.text: Overall happy with the product. The little ice cubes though are really uncomfortable for our puppy. Once it softened up he liked it more and was able to benefit from the product. Unsure if longer strips if ice cube sections rather than squares would be better. Less lumpy
customer_reviews.author: pattie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Don't believe the negative reviews. If you have dogs prone to heat issues, this mat is the tops. My pug and beagle both lay on this after their walks. If the freezer part breaks, there are alternatives and replacements. What I like most about this is that the fabric is durable and you can use it with other inserts (heated rice socks in the winter). We both have carpal tunnel syndrome and loading it is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hewes

customer_reviews.title: Probably great, but my dogs won't get on it.
customer_reviews.text: This is good quality, easy to use. I think that they should absolutely love it. Everything about it seems really great, but I just can't get either of my dogs to get on it.
customer_reviews.author: dender

customer_reviews.title: Promising
customer_reviews.text: My 60 lb dog with severe hip dysplasia found comfort laying on the cool surface and she fell into a sound sleep. The cover is durable, I hope the ice pack part holds up as well. It does get condensation on the outside but not horribly so. It stayed cold for an hour and a half while she slept in a room set at 78 degrees F. It's certainly more promising than the other options I have seen. Even if my dog doesn't end up using it regularly I will!
customer_reviews.author: jct529

customer_reviews.title: Great for hot & humid summer days
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely helps keep my dog cool and comfortable on hot summer days. The outside shell is durable and easy to clean and allows for easy removal of the ice pad so that you can switch a new one in for all day cooling capability. However, be sure to place this product in a place with little human foot traffic. I have accidentally stepped on this a few times which resulted in some of the water cells breaking. Luckily the pad only contains water and not some sort of toxic gel.
customer_reviews.author: Niliar

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute
customer_reviews.text: My dogs wanted nothing to do with this. But it was very cold and just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Jv

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husky puppy (I live in the south and it gets very warm). I stick it in the freezer overnight and after our walk I lay it down for her and she ADORES it. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Andra Op

customer_reviews.title: I like it more than the dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog didn’t particularly like laying on it (although it did help when our hvac went out on a 100 degree day and I laid it on top of him) but I love it for my own back, it’s the length of my whole body which is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Nma228

customer_reviews.title: Made with good material.
customer_reviews.text: The cooling mat is smaller than I thought it would be. But overall, great product. Sturdy and made with good material. My pug likes to lay her head on it.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart very easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought two different kinds of mats and this one was the cheaper one. I do not like that you had to freeze the part underneath and when you try and put the ice pack under the dog top it doesn't really stay directly underneath. My puppies would not use it.
customer_reviews.author: Haidee M.

customer_reviews.title: we've tried other cooling pads but our dog didn't care for them so we just bought more and more of these to keep him consistentl
customer_reviews.text: our big puppy loves this pad. we've tried other cooling pads but our dog didn't care for them so we just bought more and more of these to keep him consistently cool through the hot summer. Yes, they are not the most durable pads but well worth the investment if you want to have a happy cool dog. I even bought extras for the breeder we bought our dog from and she can't keep her dogs away from these pads.
customer_reviews.author: ewok

customer_reviews.title: Great for Texas summer outdoor dog
customer_reviews.text: Summers are brutal in Texas so I’m glad I found this for my dog. Perfect size for my 12 pound mixed chihuahua.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sweats
customer_reviews.text: the concept is great! I have tried several times to get my 4 pound yorkie to lie on it, but no luck so far. We have just moved to St. Thomas where it is always quite warm and she stays hot, but seems almost afraid of the mat. My only complaint is that as the ice inset melts it "sweats" on the actual mat and gets the surrounding area wet
customer_reviews.author: buppyt

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the green cool mats which turn to hard ...
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the green cool mats which turn to hard plastic after about 6 months to a year. This just has water pockets, so it should be reusable for its lifetime. Seems durable too. My pug took a little while to get used to it (probably because its too cold in the first few minutes), but she loves it now. Must have for hot weather.
customer_reviews.author: XlSuBlX

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended, not able to withstand chewing for more than a couple of weeks
customer_reviews.text: Worked as intended for a couple of weeks, but if your dog chews a lot, this wont last long.
customer_reviews.author: Tylor Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love this because it’s small enough to fit in just a section of her crate, is non-toxic, and is durable. My husky/Akita mix loves being cold and this is the perfect way to beat the AZ summertime heat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: My shih tzu just fits on this mat if he lays straight, but it's not big enough for him to curl up on. It took him a while to feel comfortable laying on it, but now, when it gets hot, he is more than happy to lay down and stay cool. I'm going to order another insert since obviously the ice melts quick so my dog has to wait about 2 hours for the insert to refreeze. The only difficulty with this product is that the insert doesn't easily go into the pad when it is frozen (I don't want to put the entire thing in the freezer considering my dog lays on it + freezer food).
customer_reviews.author: Rowena

customer_reviews.title: CoolDog Ice Mat
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Really liked the quality and my puppy figured it out right away and enjoyed it during many hot summer days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The pad works Really good, i just wish that the freezing liquid was ...
customer_reviews.text: The pad works Really good, i just wish that the freezing liquid was gel and not water because once it's frozen it's hard and not very comfortable for the dog.
customer_reviews.author: sabina Shawn Harris

customer_reviews.title: Moldy on arrival
customer_reviews.text: The ice mat was as advertised and came in a clean dry package, and maybe we would have liked it, but it was completely covered in mold on both front and back. We had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: big cat

customer_reviews.title: durable and portable
customer_reviews.text: stays cold for a short while, but will still be a good cooling spot for after ice melts. So far our chewing Frenchie hasn't decided to start chewing it to pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald B

customer_reviews.title: Cool pet item
customer_reviews.text: This item was smaller than I expected. Nonetheless, my pet loves sleeping on it when the temperature hit the 90's. The ice pack is easy to insert.
customer_reviews.author: Agean2010

customer_reviews.title: Gift For Fickle Little Dog
customer_reviews.text: A gift for a friend's spoiled Toy Poodle, in Southern CA. He can't decide if he likes it, or not.
customer_reviews.author: Kantor

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great keep my dog cool all the way home from our vacation which took 5hours. Would recommened it to anyone

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is awesome, definitely will be purchasing a connecting piece for when the pup gets bigger!
customer_reviews.author: Karyl

customer_reviews.title: Works, but some reservations
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for travel on an airplane in June and relaxing for the rest of the summer. Fair warning: it has to be COMPLETELY frozen when going through security, otherwise it is not allowed! Fortunately, I had no problems with that and my dog loved it :)
customer_reviews.author: K. McNitt

customer_reviews.title: The "Coolest" Dog Mat - EVER!
customer_reviews.text: My two Shih Tzu's love this! When they see me take it out of the freezer they know exactly what it is for. The only other thing I have seen them get this excited over is treats! Thank you for making it so safe for pets! Because they like to chew and I never have to worry they will get sick chewing on this. Very well made and cute too. I actually thought I might need to buy two - but they share and it is the perfect size for taking anywhere you might need it.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchel

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: We show dogs and it works great for those times when the weather is really warm and you are showing outside. Easy to use. No mess with ice.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: ... hot and for my large mastiff it was the perfect way for him to cool down on hot days ...
customer_reviews.text: Living in az it's hot and for my large mastiff it was the perfect way for him to cool down on hot days and after walks
customer_reviews.author: NICOLE

customer_reviews.title: Seems like good product, until you use it
customer_reviews.text: This would have been a great product if it worked right. Once you freeze the ice insert it is really hard to get back into the fabric sleeve. In order to use it, I had to have the insert already in the sleeve and freeze the whole product. Once the ice started melting, condensation completely soaked the fabric as well as my dog. I didn't like having to deal with a wet dog just to keep him cool. I'll find air conditioning and lots of water for him to drink before I try to use this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 11week old husky pup loves it and so do I!
customer_reviews.author: Kerrene Forde

customer_reviews.title: but are pleased with the design and quality
customer_reviews.text: We have yet to have an opportunity to use these for what we initially bought them for, but are pleased with the design and quality. They have been used a couple times in our cold bags for the boat - they are available should it become too warm for the dogs, and they help cool our drinks in the meantime. I bought 2, but will probably order one more. One is great for my Yorkie, but our bird dog will require 2 due to his size.
customer_reviews.author: F. Gast

customer_reviews.title: Miniature schnauzer loves it
customer_reviews.text: My miniature schnauzer loves it! Every night, she will automatically lie on top of the mat to sleep. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Ng

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a border collie/lab mix whose coat is mostly black. We go to agility classes, and the strong sunlight and heat really get to her. Instead of lying on this, she lies down and I put this over her back. She adores it. It refreshes her between the times she's running the agility course.

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic! They keep my dogs comfortable if the car ...
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! They keep my dogs comfortable if the car is warm - I don't leave my dogs in the car on hot days, but sometimes I need to leave them for a short while on warm days and I bring the pads with me. My dogs aren't panting when I return. My Hermione LOVES the cool feeling - when I put them on the floor of the car she settles down on one immediately! They have been very sturdy so far and I'm very pleased with them.

customer_reviews.title: couldn't have been a more perfect
customer_reviews.text: the pug loves this thing... couldn't have been a more perfect gift

I put it out with him while I was sleeping today and he left it alone (probably because he was outside playing). I put it back in the freezer and gave it to him again when I was going to a show. When i returned I discoved he'd destroyed the cover and punctured several of the water pockets. I also bought one of the gel mats. That one doesn't cool anywhere near as much as this mat, but he doesn't try and tear it up.

customer_reviews.text: Very cute. The cool pack freezes well and doesn't leak. Our dog rides on our motorcycle with us and I can't wait to use this item this summer when it is hot here.

The rubbery bottom is also nice and prevents it from moving around on the floor. I am thinking of ordering more so that each dog can have their own. Shipping was very quick. Highly recommend this product and seller.

customer_reviews.title: cooldog reusable ice mat
customer_reviews.text: Product works great and is easy to use. I feel safe using product with my dog because if she were to get a hold of it and chew it it only is filled with water. Thanks from short nosed dogs!

customer_reviews.title: CoolDog
customer_reviews.text: Actually, got it for my cat. She didn't like it so I use it on my back everynight. It's perfect. But way over priced
customer_reviews.author: penny mcginn

customer_reviews.text: Great idea.....but my dog did not stay on it, scared it. Not worth the money, all plastic and had to keep refreezing the water.

customer_reviews.title: SOOOO Cool!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Siberian Husky and I have been trying to find something that will help keep him cool. When I found these I was so excited, but I had know idea how much I would LOVE them. When I got them I was very impressed with the quality and design. They were better than I had anticipated and my dog goes crazy for them. I'm ordering some more right now so I can always have some frozen and ready to go and at their very reasonable price it is so worth it.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: good idea but I couldn't get m stubborn dog to lay on it when she was hot.

product_meta.title: CoolDog Reusable Ice Mat for Keeping Dogs Cool in Summer
product_meta.description: Beat the dog days of summer with CoolDog, reusable ice (and heat) mat for your dogs. No more lying on the ceramic floor or over your air conditioning vents. Keep your dog cool safe and happy! Simply freeze and use. Lasts for hours. Alternatively microwave for a heated blanket. Simply freeze and use! No need to add water, no slimy mess on your dog. Canvas upper is dog-tough, and non-skid lower rubber prevents mat from sliding. 24" x 12" LINKABLE Modular Design perfectly fits small and medium dogs. Velcro-type tabs allow for expansion of mat to 24"x 24", 24" x 36"and larger! Rolls up for easy storage in the freezer or your cabinet. USA made Hot/Cold insert contains safe, purified water - no dyes or gel - safe for you and your dog!
feature_bullets: Keep your dog cool safe and happy!
Durable canvas, non-slip bottom and Hot/Cold Mat insert
Purified water inside USA made Hot/Cold Mat - safe and non-toxic
Modular design links together to form larger areas!
12" x 24" size great for small/medium dogs
